pages.text: The $(thing)Wither$() is a fearsome creature that can be disastrous for many a structure if it gets loose. To protect your buildings from the $(thing)Wither$()'s destructive power you can use the $(item)Wither Proofer$(). The $(item)Wither Proofer$() will neutralize any nearby $(thing)Withers$() causing them to be unable to destroy any blocks.
Creating the $(item)Wither Proofer$() using the $(l:practices/tree_ritual)Ritual of the Forest$()
Spawning a wither using the $(l:using/animal_spawner)Altar of Birthing$()
